name: Search Questival 2020
description:
A virtual experience from Search Festival where the player roams about and interacts with a stimulating, psychedelic landscape full of quests, artworks and areas soundtracked with original music by South African producers. Completing all the quests will result in the chance to win lifetime tickets for Search Festivals in the future! We will do a raffle every three months and draw a name from those that have finished the game in this period.

The game is free to download and play,  but you can donate towards the Saartjie Baartman Centre for Women and Children (find out more here), which supports survivors of abuse. When you download the link below, you will get the opportunity to donate the amount of your choice.

Music producers:
Rose Bonica
Deep Aztec
Buli
Sound of Xee X Codekid
Seventhgaze
S2
Tzara.
